tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE client_investment_preferences (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(50),
    investment_strategy VARCHAR(50),
    investment_horizon INT,
    preferred_sectors VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomizedReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES ClientProfiles(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    report_title VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClientPreferences (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(50),
    investment_horizon INT,
    investment_style VARCHAR(50),
    investment_objectives TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name VARCHAR(50),
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    client_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES ClientPreferences(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClientReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES ClientPreferences(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPortfolio (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    asset_class VARCHAR(50),
    quantity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentReturns (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT,
    return_type VARCHAR(50),
    return_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    return_date DATE
);
